TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed UnicodeCategory extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义字符的 Unicode 类别。

span.span: Defines the Unicode category of a character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员枚举返回的和方法。A member of the enumeration is returned by the and methods. 枚举还用于支持方法，如。The enumeration is also used to support methods, such as . 此类方法确定指定的字符是否为特定的 Unicode 常规类别的成员。Such methods determine whether a specified character is a member of a particular Unicode general category. Unicode 常规类别定义的字符，即，指定为字母、 十进制数字、 分隔符、 数学符号、 标点，等一种广泛的分类。A Unicode general category defines the broad classification of a character, that is, designation as a type of letter, decimal digit, separator, mathematical symbol, punctuation, and so on. 此枚举根据 Unicode 标准，版本 5.0。This enumeration is based on The Unicode Standard, version 5.0. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Unicode 字符数据库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650)中的“UCD 文件格式”和“常规类别值”子主题。For more information, see the "UCD File Format" and "General Category Values" subtopics at the [Unicode Character Database](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650). Unicode 标准定义以下各项：The Unicode Standard defines the following: 代理项对是单个的抽象字符包含的两个代码单元，其中该对的第一个单元是一个高代理项，第二个是一个低代理项序列，编码的字符表示形式。A surrogate pair is a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. 高代理项是 Unicode 码位 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 范围中和低代理项是 Unicode 码位 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 范围中。A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF. 一个组合字符序列是基本字符和一个或多个组合字符的组合。A combining character sequence is a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 代理项对表示基字符或组合字符。A surrogate pair represents a base character or a combining character. 间距或非间距组合字符。A combining character is either spacing or nonspacing. 间距组合字符本身呈现，而非间距组合字符不占用空间位置。A spacing combining character takes up a spacing position by itself when rendered, while a nonspacing combining character does not. 标注字符是非空格组合字符的一个示例。Diacritics are an example of nonspacing combining characters. 修饰符字母是独立式的间距字符，如组合字符，该值指示前面字母的修改。A modifier letter is a free-standing spacing character that, like a combining character, indicates modifications of a preceding letter. 封闭标记是组合字符，它最多将前面的所有字符并包括基字符的不占位。An enclosing mark is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character. 格式字符是的字符，通常不呈现，但会影响文本的布局或文本处理操作。A format character is a character that is not normally rendered but that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes. Unicode 标准定义某些标点符号几种变体。The Unicode Standard defines several variations to some punctuation marks. 例如，连字符可以是多个代码值表示一个连字符，如 U + 002D （连字符减号） 或 U + 00AD 之一 （软连字符） 或 U + 2010 （连字符） 或 U + 2011 （非中断性连字符）。For example, a hyphen can be one of several code values that represent a hyphen, such as U+002D (hyphen-minus) or U+00AD (soft hyphen) or U+2010 (hyphen) or U+2011 (nonbreaking hyphen). 这同样适用短划线、 空格字符和引号引起来。The same is true for dashes, space characters, and quotation marks. Unicode 标准还将代码分配到的是特定于给定的脚本或语言，例如，U + 0030-u （数字零） 的十进制数字表示形式和 U + 0660 （阿拉伯-印度文数字零）。The Unicode Standard also assigns codes to representations of decimal digits that are specific to a given script or language, for example, U+0030 (digit zero) and U+0660 (Arabic-Indic digit zero). ## Examples 下面的示例显示 UppercaseLetter 类别中的字符和字符及其相应代码点。The following example displays the characters and their corresponding code points for characters in the UppercaseLetter category. 你可以修改此示例通过替换为你感兴趣的赋值的类别 UppercaseLetter 在任何其他类别中显示字母`category`变量。You can modify the example to display the letters in any other category by replacing UppercaseLetter with the category of interest to you in the assignment to the `category` variable. 请注意某些类别的输出可能非常大。Note that the output for some categories can be extensive. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory/cs/Characters1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory/vb/Characters1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ClosePunctuation = int32(21)
ClosePunctuation = 21

summary.span: 成对的标点符号（例如括号、方括号和大括号）的结束字符。

span.span: Closing character of one of the paired punctuation marks, such as parentheses, square brackets, and braces.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Pe”（标点，结束）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pe" (punctuation, close).

summary.span: 值为 21。

span.span: The value is 21.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ConnectorPunctuation = int32(18)
ConnectorPunctuation = 18

summary.span: 连接两个字符的连接符标点字符。

span.span: Connector punctuation character that connects two characters.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Pc”（标点，连接符）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pc" (punctuation, connector).

summary.span: 值为 18。

span.span: The value is 18.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory Control = int32(14)
Control = 14

summary.span: 控制代码字符，其 Unicode 值为 U+007F，或者属于 U+0000 到 U+001F 或 U+0080 到 U+009F 的范围内。

span.span: Control code character, with a Unicode value of U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Cc”（其他，控制）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cc" (other, control).

summary.span: 值为 14。

span.span: The value is 14.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory CurrencySymbol = int32(26)
CurrencySymbol = 26

summary.span: 货币符号字符。

span.span: Currency symbol character.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Sc”（符号，货币）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Sc" (symbol, currency).

summary.span: 值为 26。

span.span: The value is 26.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory DashPunctuation = int32(19)
DashPunctuation = 19

summary.span: 短划线或连字符字符。

span.span: Dash or hyphen character.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Pd”（标点，短划线）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pd" (punctuation, dash).

summary.span: 值为 19。

span.span: The value is 19.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory DecimalDigitNumber = int32(8)
DecimalDigitNumber = 8

summary.span: 十进制数字字符，即范围 0 到 9 内的字符。

span.span: Decimal digit character, that is, a character in the range 0 through 9.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Nd”（数字，十进制数字）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Nd" (number, decimal digit).

summary.span: 值为 8。

span.span: The value is 8.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory EnclosingMark = int32(7)
EnclosingMark = 7

summary.span: 封闭符号字符，它是将基字符前面的所有字符（包括基字符）括起来的不占位字符。

span.span: Enclosing mark character, which is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Me”（符号，封闭）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Me" (mark, enclosing).

summary.span: 值为 7。

span.span: The value is 7.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory FinalQuotePunctuation = int32(23)
FinalQuotePunctuation = 23

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Pf”（标点，后引号）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pf" (punctuation, final quote).

summary.span: 值为 23。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory Format = int32(15)
Format = 15

summary.span: 格式字符，它影响文本的布局或文本处理操作，但通常不呈现。

span.span: Format character that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes, but is not normally rendered.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Cf”（其他，格式）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cf" (other, format).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory LetterNumber = int32(9)
LetterNumber = 9

summary.span: 由字母表示的数字，而不是十进制数字，例如，罗马数字 5 由字母“V”表示。

span.span: Number represented by a letter, instead of a decimal digit, for example, the Roman numeral for five, which is "V".

summary.span: 此指示符由 Unicode 代码“Nl”（数字，字母）表示。

span.span: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Nl" (number, letter).

summary.span: 值为 9。

span.span: The value is 9.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ModifierLetter = int32(3)
ModifierLetter = 3

summary.span: 修饰符字母字符，它是独立式的间距字符，指示前面字母的修改。

span.span: Modifier letter character, which is free-standing spacing character that indicates modifications of a preceding letter.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Lm”（字母，修饰符）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lm" (letter, modifier).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory ModifierSymbol = int32(27)
ModifierSymbol = 27

summary.span: 修饰符符号字符，它指示环绕字符的修改。

span.span: Modifier symbol character, which indicates modifications of surrounding characters.

summary.span: 例如，分数斜线号指示其左侧的数字为分子，右侧的数字为分母。

span.span: For example, the fraction slash indicates that the number to the left is the numerator and the number to the right is the denominator.

summary.span: 此指示符由 Unicode 代码“Sk”（符号，修饰符）表示。

span.span: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Sk" (symbol, modifier).

summary.span: 值为 27。

span.span: The value is 27.

NonSpacingMark = 5

span.span: Nonspacing character that indicates modifications of a base character.

summary.span: 由 Unicode 代码“Mn”（符号，不占位）表示。

span.span: Signified by the Unicode designation "Mn" (mark, nonspacing).

summary.span: 值为 5。

span.span: The value is 5.
